param.name: webhelp.topic.collapsible.elements.initial.state
param.desc: Set the inital state of collapsible elements.

param.name: webhelp.logo.image
param.desc: The URL of a remote file or the file path of a local file that contains the logo image that will be added in the header area.

param.name: webhelp.logo.image.target.url
param.desc: The URL of the link that will be opened when the user clicks the logo image.

param.name: webhelp.logo.image.alt
param.desc: Alternative text for the logo image.

param.name: webhelp.search.ranking
param.desc: If this parameter is set to false, then the 5-star rating mechanism is no longer included in the search results that are displayed on the Search tab (default setting is true).

param.name: webhelp.fragment.welcome
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content as welcome message in the main page of the generated output.

param.name: webhelp.top.menu.depth
param.desc: Specifies the maximum depth of the topics top menu.

param.name: webhelp.show.main.page.tiles
param.desc: Specifies if topic tiles will be presented in the main page.

param.name: webhelp.show.main.page.toc
param.desc: Specifies if Table of Contents (TOC) will be presented in the main page in a tree like (accordion) fashion.

param.name: webhelp.show.breadcrumb
param.desc: Specifies if the breadcrumb component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.show.navigation.links
param.desc: Specifies if the navigation links component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.show.print.link
param.desc: Specifies if the print link component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.show.expand.collapse.sections
param.desc: Specifies if the Expand/Collapse Sections button will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.show.indexterms.link
param.desc: Specifies if the link to the index terms will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.show.topic.toc
param.desc: Specifies if the topic page TOC component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.publication.toc.hide.chunked.topics
param.desc: Specifies if the Publication TOC component will contain links for the chunked topics.

param.name: webhelp.show.publication.toc
param.desc: Specifies if the Publication TOC component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output for 'topic' files.

param.name: webhelp.publication.toc.links
param.desc: Specifies which links will be included in the Publication TOC of each topic.

val.desc: The Publication TOC will include only the links to the current topic and its children.
The Publication TOC will include the links to the current topic, its children, and its ancestors.
The Publication TOC will include all links.

param.name: webhelp.show.top.menu
param.desc: Specifies if the top menu component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.top.menu.activated.on.click
param.desc: Specifies if the top menu component will be activated by a click event instead of the default activation (hover).

param.name: webhelp.show.related.links
param.desc: Specifies if the related links component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.merge.nested.topics.related.links
param.desc: Specifies if the related links from the nested topics of will be merged with the links in the parent topic. Thus the links will be moved from the topic content to the related links component.

param.name: webhelp.show.child.links
param.desc: Specifies if the child links component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.show.toggle.highlights
param.desc: Specifies if the toggle highlights component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.footer
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content as footer in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.logo_and_title
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the logo and title in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.logo_and_title
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the logo and title in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.top_menu
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the top menu in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.top_menu
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the top menu in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.head
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It inserts the given XHTML content in the 'head' element of all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.head.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It inserts the given XHTML content in the 'head' element of the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.head.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It inserts the given XHTML content in the 'head' element of each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.head.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It inserts the given XHTML content in the 'head' element of the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.head.terms.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It inserts the given XHTML content in the 'head' element of the Index Terms page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.header
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content as header in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.header
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the header section in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.header.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the header section in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.header.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the header section in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.header.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the header section in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.header.terms.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the header section in the Index Terms page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.body
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the beginning of the html 'body' element in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.body.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the beginning of the html 'body' element in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.body.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the beginning of the html 'body' element in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.body.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the beginning of the html 'body' element in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.body.terms.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the beginning of the html 'body' element in the Index Terms page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.body
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the end of the html 'body' element in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.body.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the end of the html 'body' element in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.body.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the end of the html 'body' element in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.body.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the end of the html 'body' element in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.body.terms.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. The XHTML content will be included at the end of the html 'body' element in the Index Terms page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.search.input
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the search field in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.search.input.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the search field in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.search.input.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the search field in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.search.input.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the search field in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.search.input
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the search field in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.search.input.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the search field in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.search.input.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the search field in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.search.input.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the search field in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.main.content.area
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.main.content.area.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.main.content.area.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.main.content.area.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.main.content.area.terms.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content before the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in the Index Terms page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.main.content.area
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in all generated WebHelp pages.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.main.content.area.main.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in the Main page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.main.content.area.topic.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in each Topic page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.main.content.area.search.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in the Search Results page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.main.content.area.terms.page
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content after the main content section ('div.wh_content_area') in the Index Terms page.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.toc_or_tiles
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the main page of the generated WebHelp output, before the table of contents or tiles component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.toc_or_tiles
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the main page of the generated WebHelp output, after the table of contents or tiles component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.topic.toolbar
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, before the toolbar buttons from above the topic content.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.topic.toolbar
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, after the toolbar buttons from above the topic content.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.topic.breadcrumb
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, before the topic's breadcrumb component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.topic.breadcrumb
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, after the topic's breadcrumb component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.publication.toc
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, before the topic's Publication Table of Contents component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.publication.toc
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, after the topic's Publication Table of Contents component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.topic.content
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, before the topic's content.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.topic.content
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, after the topic's content.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.feedback
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, before the topic's Feedback component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.feedback
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, after the topic's Feedback component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.before.topic.toc
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, before the topic's Table of Contents component.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.after.topic.toc
param.desc: Specifies either an XHTML fragment or the path to an XHTML file. It displays the given XHTML content in the Topic page of the generated WebHelp output, after the topic's Table of Contents component.

param.name: webhelp.enable.search.autocomplete
param.desc: Specifies if autocomplete feature is enabled in the WebHelp search text field.

param.name: webhelp.enable.sticky.header
param.desc: Specifies if the header section will remain sticky in the WebHelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.enable.sticky.publication.toc
param.desc: Specifies if the publication toc will remain sticky in the WebHelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.enable.sticky.topic.toc
param.desc: Specifies if the topic toc will remain sticky in the WebHelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.enable.search.kuromoji.js
param.desc: Specifies if Kuromoji analyzer is enabled in the WebHelp search.

param.name: webhelp.publishing.template
param.desc: Specifies the path to the folder containing the custom WebHelp Responsive template.

param.name: webhelp.publishing.template.descriptor
param.desc: Specifies the name of the descriptor to be loaded from the WebHelp Responsive template package. If it is not specified, the first encountered descriptor will be automatically loaded.

param.name: webhelp.publication.toc.tooltip.position
param.desc: Specifies the tooltip position relative to the current topic in the Publication TOC.

param.name: args.hdf
param.desc: DEPRECATED: Use webhelp.fragment.head instead.

param.name: args.hdr
param.desc: DEPRECATED: Use webhelp.fragment.before.body instead.

param.name: webhelp.search.enable.pagination
param.desc: Specifies if search result items will be displayed on multiple pages or not.

param.name: webhelp.search.page.numberOfItems
param.desc: Specifies the number of search results items displayed on each page. This parameter is used only when the 'webhelp.search.enable.pagination' parameter is enabled.

param.name: webhelp.search.stop.words.exclude
param.desc: Specifies a list of words that should be excluded from the default stop words list. Use comma separator to specify more than one word. Sample: 'if,for'.

param.name: webhelp.search.stop.words.include
param.desc: Specifies a list of words that should be included in the default stop words list. Use comma separator to specify more than one word. Sample: 'if,for'.

param.name: webhelp.search.index.elements.to.exclude
param.desc: Specifies a list of HTML elements that will not be indexed by the search engine. The value of the @class attribute can be used to exclude specific HTML elements from indexing. For example, the 'div.not-indexed' value will not index all <div> elements that have a @class attribute with the value of 'not-indexed'. Use a comma separator to specify more than one element. Example: 'table,span.not-indexed,div.not-indexed'.

param.name: webhelp.default.collection.type.sequence
param.desc: Specifies if the 'sequence' value will be used by default when the collection-type attribute is not specified. This option is helpful if you want to have 'Next' and 'Previous' navigational buttons generated for all HTML pages.

param.name: webhelp.enable.template.js.module.loading
param.desc: Specifies if the custom JavaScript module specified in the Publishing Template should be loaded or not via a 'require()' call using the RequireJS library.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.feedback
param.desc: Specifies the path to the XHTML file used to initialize the WebHelp Feedback system.

param.name: webhelp.show.full.size.image
param.desc: Specifies if responsive images that are displayed with a smaller dimension than their original size can be clicked to see an enlarged version of the image.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.custom.search.engine.script
param.desc: Replaces WebHelp's built-in search engine with your own custom search engine. The value of the parameter is the path to an XHTML file that contains the scripts required for your custom search engine to run.

param.name: webhelp.fragment.custom.search.engine.results
param.desc: Replaces the search results area with a custom XHTML content. The value of the parameter is the path to an XHTML file that contains your custom content.

param.name: webhelp.enable.html.fragments.cleanup
param.desc:
Enables/disables automatically conversion of the values provided as HTML fragments to well-formed XML fragments.
If it set to 'true', then the fragments that are not XML well-formed are converted.
Otherwise, the transformation will fail if at least one HTML fragment is not well formed.

param.name: webhelp.html.fragments.converter.properties.file
param.desc:
Path to the file containing properties for configuring the HTML to Well Formed XML converter.
The available properties are described here: http://htmlcleaner.sourceforge.net/parameters.php#params

param.name: webhelp.show.pdf.link
param.desc: Specifies if the PDF link component will be presented in the Webhelp Responsive output.

param.name: webhelp.pdf.link.url
param.desc: Specifies the target URL for the PDF link.

param.name: webhelp.pdf.link.text
param.desc: Specifies the text for the PDF link.

param.name: webhelp.pdf.link.icon.path
param.desc: Specifies the path or the URL of the image icon used for the PDF link.

param.name: webhelp.pdf.link.name.destination.enabled
param.desc: Specifies if the current topic ID should be appended as name destination at the end of the PDF link.

param.name: webhelp.enable.block.elements.id.generation
param.desc: Specifies if the data-ofbid attribute should be auto generated for block elements in the Webhelp Responsive output. If is set to 'yes' and Oxygen Feedback is integrated in the Webhelp Responsive output then you will be able to add and manage comments contextually at a specific location within the output page where block elements appear (e.g. section, paragraph, list, or table elements).

param.name: webhelp.rellinks.group.mode
param.desc: Indicates how related links should be grouped. Either as a single group or as multiple groups depending on the links target type (topic, task or concept).

param.name: webhelp.figure.title.placement
param.desc: Controls the placement of the figure title relative to the image.

param.name: webhelp.table.title.placement
param.desc: Controls the placement of the table title.
